body_html: So... I forgot that out=... functions can resize their outputs, which will break automatic differentiation. I'm going to change the VariableType.cpp implementation to only allow out= calls when none of the inputs or outputs has requires_grad=True to disable automatic differentiation for now.

body: So... I forgot that `out=...` functions can resize their outputs, which will break automatic differentiation. I'm going to change the `VariableType.cpp` implementation to only allow `out=` calls when none of the inputs or outputs has `requires_grad=True` to disable automatic differentiation for now.
